We hope that he marries our daughter.
translit: anaxnu meqawim shehu itxaten im bitenu.

text: We hope that he has a lot of money.
translit: anaxnu meqawim sheyesh lo harbeh kesef.

text: We hope that he is a millionaire.
I heard that your wife had an accident.
I heard that she is in the hospital.
I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
translate: ‫זה משמח אותי שאת / ה רוצה לקנות את הבית.‬
translit: zeh messameax oti she'atah/she'at rotseh/rotsah liqnot et habait.

text: I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
translate: ‫אני חושש / ת שהאוטובוס האחרון כבר יצא.‬
translit: ani xoshesh/xosheshet sheha'otobus ha'axaron kvar yatsa.

text: I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
I’m afraid I have no more money.
translate: ‫אני חושש / ת שאין לי כאן כסף.‬
translit: ani xoshesh/xosheshet she'eyn li ka'n kesef.

text: Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.
translate: ‫אולי מזג האוויר יהיה מחר טוב יותר.‬
translit: ulay mezeg ha'awir ihieh maxar tov yotr.

text: I hope that it gets better.
translate: ‫אני מקווה שמזג האוויר יהיה טוב יותר.‬
translit: ani meqaweh shemezeg ha'awir ihieh tov yotr.

text: Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.

translate: ‫אני סבור / ה שהוא נראה אפילו טוב מאוד.‬
translit: ani savur/svurah sh'hu nir'eh afilu tov me'od.

text: The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
translate: ‫אני קם / ה כאשר השעון המעורר מצלצל.‬
translit: ani qam/qamah ka'asher hasha'on hame'orer metsaltsel.

text: I become tired as soon as I have to study.
translate: ‫אני מרגיש עייף / ה כשאני צריך / ה ללמוד.‬
translit: ani margish ayef/ayefah keshe'ani tsarikh/tsrikhah lilmod.

text: I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
translit: ani afsiq la'avod keshe'agia legil shishim.

text: As soon as I have a moment.
He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
translit: hu itqasher kesheyhieh lo qtsat zman.

text: I’ll work as long as I can.
I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
translate: ‫אני אעבוד כל זמן שאהיה בריא / ה.‬
translit: ani e'evod kol zman she'ehieh bari/briah.

text: He lies in bed instead of working.
She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
He is at the bar instead of going home.
translit: hu yoshev bapa'b bimqom lalekhet habaytah.

text: As far as I know, he lives here.
translate: ‫עד כמה שאני יודע הוא גר כאן.‬
translit: ad kamah she'ani yode'a hu gar ka'n.

text: As far as I know, his wife is ill.
translit: ad kamah she'ani yode'a ishto xolah.

text: As far as I know, he is unemployed.
translit: ad kamah she'ani yode'a hu muvtal.

text: I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫התעוררתי מאוחר אחרת הייתי מגיע / ה בזמן.‬
translit: hit'orarti me'uxar axeret haiti magi'a/megi'ah bazman.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫איחרתי לאוטובוס אחרת הייתי מגיע / ה בזמן.‬
translit: ixarti la'otobus axeret haiti magi'a/megi'ah bazman.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫לא מצאתי את הדרך אחרת הייתי מגיע / ה בזמן.‬
translit: lo matsa'ti et haderekh axeret haiti magi'a/megi'ah bazman.

text: I’ll wait until my hair is dry.
I’ll wait until the film is over.
I’ll wait until the traffic light is green.
When do you go on holiday?
Yes, before the summer holidays begin.
translit: ken, afilu lifney txilat xufshat haqaits.

text: Repair the roof before the winter begins.
translate: ‫תקן / י את הגג לפני תחילת החורף.‬
translit: taqen/taqni et hagag lifney txilat haxoref.

text: Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
translate: ‫שטוף / שטפי ידיים לפני שתשב / י לשולחן.‬

text: Close the window before you go out.
translate: ‫סגור / סגרי את החלון לפני שתצא / י.‬

text: Yes, after the class is over.
After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
translate: ‫אחרי התאונה הוא לא יכול היה יותר לעבוד.‬
translit: axarey hate'unah hu lo yakhol hayah yoter la'avod.

text: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
translate: ‫אחרי שהוא פוטר מהעבודה הוא עזב לאמריקה.‬
translit: axarey sh'hu putar meha'avodah hu azav le'ameriqah.

text: After he went to America, he became rich.
translit: axarey sh'hu avar le'ameriqah hu hit'asher.

text: Why aren’t you eating the cake?
translate: ‫מדוע את / ה לא אוכל / ת את העוגה?‬
translit: madu'a atah/at lo okhel/okhelet et ha'ugah?

text: I’m not eating it because I must lose weight.
translate: ‫אני לא אוכל אותה כי אני מוכרח / ה לרזות.‬
translit: ani lo okhel/okhelet otah ki ani mukhrax/mukhraxah lirzot.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the beer?
translate: ‫מדוע את / ה לא שותה את הבירה?‬
translit: madu'a atah/at lo shoteh/shotah et habirah?

text: I’m not drinking it because I have to drive.
translate: ‫אני לא שותה אותה כי אני צריך / ה לנהוג.‬
translit: ani lo shoteh/shotah otah ki ani tsarikh/tsrikhah linhog.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the coffee?
translate: ‫מדוע את / ה לא שותה את הקפה?‬
translit: madu'a atah/at lo shoteh/shotah et haqafeh?

text: I’m not drinking it because it is cold.
translate: ‫אני לא שותה אותו כי הוא קר.‬
translit: ani lo shoteh/shotah oto ki hu qar.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the tea?
translate: ‫מדוע את / ה לא שותה את התה?‬
translit: madu'a atah/at lo shoteh/shotah et hateh?

text: I’m not drinking it because I don’t have any sugar.
translate: ‫אני לא שותה אותו כי אין לי סוכר.‬
translit: ani lo shoteh/shotah oto ki eyn li sukar.

text: Why aren’t you eating the soup?
translate: ‫מדוע את / ה לא אוכל / ת את המרק?‬
translit: madu'a atah/at lo okhel/okhelet et hamaraq?

text: I’m not eating it because I didn’t order it.
translate: ‫אני לא אוכל / ת את המרק כי לא הזמנתי אותו.‬
translit: ani lo okhel/okhelet et hamaraq ki lo hizmanti oto.

text: Why don’t you eat the meat?
translate: ‫מדוע את / ה לא אוכל / ת את הבשר?‬
translit: madu'a atah/at lo okhel/okhelet et habassar?

text: I’m not eating it because I am a vegetarian.
translate: ‫אני לא אוכל / ת את הבשר כי אני צמחוני / ת.‬
translit: ani lo okhel/okhelet et habassar ki ani tsimxoni/tsimxonit.

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
translit: hatiul hayah yafeh aval me'ayef miday.

text: The train was on time, but too full.
translate: ‫הרכבת הגיעה בזמן אבל הייתה מלאה מדי.‬
translit: harakevet higia'h bazman aval haytah mele'ah miday.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
translit: hamalon hayah tov aval yaqar miday.

text: He’ll take either the bus or the train.
He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translit: hu yagia ha'erev o maxar baboqer.

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
She speaks Spanish as well as English.
She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
She knows Spain as well as England.
translit: hi mekhirah et sfarad we'et angliah.

text: He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
translate: ‫הוא לא רק טיפש אלא גם עצלן.‬
translit: hu lo raq tipesh ela gam atslan.

text: She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translate: ‫היא לא רק יפה אלא גם חכמה.‬
translit: hi lo raq yafah ela gam xakhamah.

text: She speaks not only German, but also French.
translate: ‫היא לא דוברת רק גרמנית אלא גם צרפתית.‬
translit: hi lo doveret raq germanit ela gam tsarfatit.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
translate: ‫אני לא יכול / ה לנגן לא בפסנתר ולא בגיטרה.‬
translit: ani lo yakhol/yakholah lenagen lo bifsanter w'lo begitarah.

text: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
translate: ‫אני לא יכול / ה לרקוד לא ואלס ולא סמבה.‬
translit: ani lo yakhol/yakholah lirqod lo wa'ls w'lo samvah.

text: I like neither opera nor ballet.
translate: ‫אני לא אוהב / ת לא אופרה ולא בלט.‬
translit: ani lo ohev/ohevet lo operah w'lo balet.

text: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: ‫ככל שתעבוד / תעבדי מהר יותר כך תסיים / י מוקדם יותר.‬
translit: kekhol sheta'avod/shta'avdi maher yoter, kakh tesaym/tesaymi muqdam yoter.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: ‫ככל שתגיע / י מוקדם יותר, כך תוכל / י ללכת מוקדם יותר.‬
translit: kekhol shetagi'a/shetagi'i muqdam yoter, kakh tukhal/tukhli lalekhet muqdam yoter.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: ‫ככל שאדם מתבגר, כן הוא אוהב יותר נוחות.‬
translit: kekhol she'adam mitbager, ken hu ohev yoter noxut.

text: He fell asleep although the TV was on.
translit: hu nirdam lamrot shehatelewiziah haytah dluqah.

text: He stayed a while although it was late.
He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
translit: hu lo higia lamrot sheqava'nu lehipagesh.

text: The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
translate: ‫הטלוויזיה הייתה דלוקה. למרות זאת הוא נרדם.‬
translit: hatelewiziah haytah dluqah. lamrot zo't hu nirdam.

text: It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
translate: ‫היה כבר מאוחר. למרות זאת הוא נשאר.‬
translit: hayah kvar me'uxar. lamrot zo't hu nish'ar.

text: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
translate: ‫קבענו להיפגש. למרות זאת הוא לא הגיע.‬
translit: qava'nu lehipagesh. lamrot zo't hu lo higia.

text: Although he has no license, he drives the car.
translate: ‫הוא נוהג במכונית למרות שאין לו רישיון נהיגה.‬
translit: hu noheg bamekhonit lamrot she'eyn low rishion n'higah.

text: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
translit: hu nose'a maher lamrot shehakvish xalaq/maxliq.

text: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
translate: ‫הוא רוכב על אופניים למרות שהוא שתוי.‬
translit: hu rokhev al ofanaim lamrot shehu shatuy.

text: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
translate: ‫אין לו רישיון נהיגה ולמרות זאת הוא נוהג במכונית.‬
translit: eyn lo rishyon n'higah w'lamrot zo't hu noheg bamekhonit.

text: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
translate: ‫הכביש מחליק ולמרות זאת הוא נוסע מהר.‬
translit: hakvish maxliq w'lamrot zo't hu nose'a maher.

text: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
translate: ‫הוא שתוי ולמרות זאת הוא רוכב על אופניים.‬
translit: hu shatuy w'lamrot zo't hu rokhev al ofanaim.

text: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: ‫היא לא מוצאת עבודה למרות שהיא למדה.‬
translit: hi lo motse't avodah lamrot shehi lamdah.

text: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: ‫היא לא הולכת לרופא למרות שיש לה כאבים.‬
translit: hi lo holekhet larofe lamrot sheyesh lah ke'evim.

text: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: ‫היא קונה מכונית למרות שאין לה כסף.‬
translit: hi qonah mekhonit lamrot she'eyn lah kesef.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: ‫היא למדה ולמרות זאת היא לא מוצאת עבודה.‬
translit: hi lamdah w'lamrot zo't hi lo motse't avodah.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: ‫יש לה כאבים ולמרות זאת היא לא הולכת לרופא.‬
translit: yesh lah ke'evim w'lamrot zo't hi lo holekhet larofe.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: ‫אין לה כסף ולמרות זאת היא קונה מכונית.‬
translit: eyn lah kesef w'lamrot zo't hi qonah mekhonit.

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
No, I don’t know anyone here.
translate: ‫לא, אני לא מכיר / ה כאן אף אחד.‬
translit: lo, ani lo mekir/mekirah ka'n af exad.

text: a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
No, I won’t stay here much longer.
translate: ‫לא, אני לא נשאר / ת עוד הרבה זמן.‬
translit: lo, ani lo nish'ar/nish'eret od harbeh zman.

text: Would you like to drink something else?
No, I don’t want anything else.
translit: lo, ani lo rotseh/rotsah lishtot yoter.

text: No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.
translit: lo, adayn lo akhalti shum davar.

text: Does anyone else want a coffee?
The button from the shirt is gone.
The boss’ computer is not working.
How do I get to her parents’ house?
translit: keytsad ukhal lehagia lebeytam shel horeyah?

text: The house is at the end of the road.
Since when is she no longer working?
What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
What is the title of the book?
What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?
What are the doctor’s consultation times?
What time is the museum open?
Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translit: ken, hi lo ovedet me'az shihitxatnah.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
translit: me'az shehi hitxatnah hi lo ovedet.

text: Since they have met each other, they are happy.
Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: ‫מאז שיש להם ילדים הם יוצאים לעיתים רחוקות.‬
translit: me'az sheyesh lahem yeladim hem yots'im le'itim rexoqot.

translate: ‫היא מדברת בטלפון בזמן שהיא נוסעת במכונית.‬
translit: hi medaberet batelefon bazman shehi nosa'at bamekhonit.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
translit: hi tsofah batelewiziah bazman shehi megahetset.

text: She listens to music while she does her work.
translate: ‫היא מאזינה למוסיקה בזמן שהיא עושה שיעורי בית.‬
translit: hi ma'azinah lemusiqah bazman shehi ossah shi'ourey bayt.

text: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
translate: ‫אני לא רואה כלום כאשר אין לי משקפיים.‬
translit: ani lo ro'eh/ro'ah klum ka'asher eyn li mishqafaim.

text: I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: ‫אני לא מבין / ה כלום כשהמוסיקה כה רועשת.‬
translit: ani lo mevin/mevinah klum kshehamusiqah koh ro'eshet.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
translate: ‫אני לא מריח / ה כלום כאשר אני מצונן / ת.‬
translit: ani lo meriax/merixah klum ka'asher ani metsunan/metsunenet.

text: We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
translit: anaxnu loqxim monit ka'asher yored geshem.

text: We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
translit: im nizkeh baloto nis'a letayel ba'olam.

text: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
translate: ‫אם הוא לא יגיע בקרוב נתחיל לאכול.‬
translit: im hu lo yagi'a beqarov natxil le'ekhol.

text: He is here and she is here.
We like to go for a walk in summer.
It snows or rains in winter.
We like to stay home in winter.
What is the weather like today?
